name: Poorly Drawn Portal
description:
Portal, but you draw the portals yourself (poorly)

In all honesty, I am just uploading this here as a demo or smth, because I have zero ideas on what to do with it, even though the main aspect of drawing portals yourself could be fun.

Technically you need to draw a portal by drawing a circle, the color should change to be slightly darker, but I never fully finished this, so you can draw any shape, though with a little wiggling of your circle, the color should still change.

m1 to draw the orange portal, m2 to draw the blue one, wasd to move. It's a little janky but should work - Only from orange to blue for now though. Enjoy :)
